content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Project Resource Plan contains the list of all allocated for the project resources by location, position, etc. and shows workload of particular employee on the project. To check Project's Resource Plan go to UPSA â†’ search for the project :\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/d58c3421-cce9-45eb-8784-13ba172315c3/image2014-10-17%2016:48:26.png\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":552,\"height\":140}},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"PM and PC are responsible for maintaining Resource Plan up to date, for adding/ removing project members and updating their workload.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/c1a839d4-ab89-47f2-bbe1-fd2225cfea27/image2014-10-17%2016:48:36.png\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":553,\"height\":247.99999999999997}},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\n\\n\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
